attributes.action: fair pricing when animals are sick
attributes.additional_details: Because animals are dying and they don’t need to die sometimes owners just listen to vet or think they don’t have money so have no other choice
attributes.background: I would like the government to make pet prices all the same and a fair amazing for everyone to pay not 1000 pound for this or a 1000 pound for that

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about veterinary prices are a matter for individual vets, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Set up a parliamentary select committee to investigate veterinary costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604550
